'Generated by LateBindingApi.CodeGenerator
Imports System
Imports System.Reflection
Imports System.ComponentModel
Imports System.Collections.Generic
Imports LateBindingApi.Core

Namespace %AssemblyName%Api.Utils

    ''' <summary>
    ''' necessary factory info, used from LateBindingApi.Core.Factory while Initialize()
    ''' </summary>
    Public Class ProjectInfo
        Implements IFactoryInfo

#Region "Fields"

        Private _namespace As String = "%Namespace%"
        Private _componentGuid As Guid = New Guid("%GUID%")
        Private _assembly As Assembly
        Private _exportedTypes As Type()
        Private _dependents() As String = %dependencies%

#End Region

#Region "Construction"

        Public Sub New()

            _assembly = Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly()

        End Sub

#End Region

#Region "IFactoryInfo Members"

        Public Function Contains(ByVal className As String) As Boolean Implements IFactoryInfo.Contains

            If (LateBindingApi.Core.Utils.IsNothing(_exportedTypes)) Then
                _exportedTypes = Assembly.GetExportedTypes()
            End If

            For Each item As Type In _exportedTypes
                If (item.Name.EndsWith(className, StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase)) Then
                    Return True
                End If
            Next

            Return False

        End Function

        Public ReadOnly Property AssemblyNamespace() As String Implements IFactoryInfo.AssemblyNamespace

            Get
                Return _namespace
            End Get

        End Property

        Public ReadOnly Property ComponentGuid() As Guid Implements IFactoryInfo.ComponentGuid

            Get
                Return _componentGuid
            End Get

        End Property

        Public ReadOnly Property Assembly() As Assembly Implements IFactoryInfo.Assembly

            Get
                Return _assembly
            End Get

        End Property


        Public ReadOnly Property Dependencies() As String() Implements IFactoryInfo.Dependencies

            Get
                Return _dependents
            End Get

        End Property

#End Region

    End Class

End Namespace
